<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Config

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.36

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>  Returns an array of config entries which meet criteria in condition code. Command iterates through available classes and config properties for given config entry. If 3rd param is [[true]] the search also includes inherited properties. Current looked at config is stored in _x variable (similar to alternative [[count]] command implementation). Condition has to return [[true]] in order for the looked at property to be added to the resulting array. A bit slower than [[configClasses]] but allows to access inherited entries.
<br><br><template><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Warning</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value> The condition code passed to [[configProperties]] should only be used for '''simple filter expressions''' and nothing more</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>Feature</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Informative</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>With <template><title>arma3</title></template> 2.01.147002 the following conditions were optimised inside the engine:
* <tt>"true" </tt> (condition omitted)
* <tt>isClass _x</tt>
* <tt>isClass _x &&</tt> </value></part></template>

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''configProperties''' [config, condition, inherit]

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> [config, condition, inherit]: [[Array]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> config: [[Config]] - config entry to search

</value></part><part><name>p3</name>=<value> condition (Optional): [[String]] - expression, which if returns [[true]], adds current property to result. Default: "[[true]]"

</value></part><part><name>p4</name>=<value> inherit (Optional): [[Boolean]] - include inherited properties. Default: [[true]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] - Array of [[Config]]s

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_configs = [[configProperties]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "O_Truck_02_box_F"];</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>		
  
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_configs = [[configProperties]] [<ext><name>nowiki</name><attr/></ext>[[configFile]] >> "RscText", "[[true]]", [[true]]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>x3</name>=<value> Get all hitpoints of a truck:<code>_hitPoints = [];
_hitPointsCfgs = [[configProperties]] [
	[[configFile]] >> "CfgVehicles" >> "O_Truck_02_box_F" >> "HitPoints", 
	"[[true]]", 
	[[true]]
];
[[hint]] [[str]] _hitPointsCfgs;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Config]], [[configFile]], [[missionConfigFile]], [[configClasses]], [[configHierarchy]]
</value></part></template>
